comment: The membership relation and the membership predicate agree when the "containing" class is a set. General version of ~ epel and closed form of ~ epeli . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 27-Mar-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2015.) (Proof shortened by BJ, 14-Jul-2023.)
